fullText: Barry Manilow and Bruce Sussman's musical about the Comedian Harmonists, a German singing group that was torn apart by the rise of the Nazis, is a work of undeniable sincerity and craft.
dtliExcerpt: Barry Manilow and Bruce Sussman's musical about the Comedian Harmonists, a German singing group that was torn apart by the rise of the Nazis, is a work of undeniable sincerity and craft.
